github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Check for vectorization: hot paths should use NumPy/kernel ops, not Python loops.
Verify type hints on all public functions and methods.
Ensure RNG uses np.random.default_rng(seed), not global random state.
Check imports follow stdlib → third-party → local order with no wildcards.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commit format: type(scope): description
Types: feat, fix, refactor, test, docs, perf, chore
Scopes: algo, kernel, problem, tuning, cli, operators, core
Example: feat(algo): add IBEA indicator-based selection

github.copilot.chat.pullRequestDescripti.text: Start with a one-line summary of what changed and why.
Include a '## Changes' section with bullet points for each file/module touched.
Add '## Testing' section describing how to verify the change (pytest command or manual steps).
If touching algorithms/kernels, note any performance implications.
